response.overview: For centuries, the ancient and elite bloodlines have been conspiring and plotting to achieve a New World Order, a totalitarian government to rule the entire world. The creation of kingdoms, institutions and global corporations are all part of the power play to dominate mankind. Under the auspices of "free will' and "progress" the human race is in truth, being manipulated by a nefarious force that is as old as humanity itself. These forces have been orchestrating world events since time immemorial and have left traces of their existence in code, cipher and symbolism...not the least of which is 666, the number of the beast. Explore the truth behind the global agenda and how the Antichrist plays a role in the slave/master prophecy of power relegated to the chosen few.
response.tagline: Explore the truth behind the global agenda and how the anti-christ plays a role in the slave/master prophecy of power relegated to the chosen few.
response.title: 666: New World Order
